title: Progressive Post-Evangelicals and their Struggle with the Bible
description:
This is the third/first of the hesitancy videos I made. Again, for me these videos are very much "on the way" in terms of figuring out how to talk about what is happening with post-evangelicalism.

Post-evangelical progressivism is a collision between two worlds, the world many of these people were raised in with the assumptions about what the Bible is, and then the change in the culture. I don't think the Bible is quite what they think it is, nor are we. Here are a few disorganized thoughts about it. 

MikeinSac on the Bible https://mikeinsac.com/2019/09/02/my-struggle-to-believe-in-a-bible-without-errors/ 
Mike's twitter account https://twitter.com/sacwriter
Jordan Peterson Biblical Series 1 https://youtu.be/f-wWBGo6a2w
Tom Holland Delingpod https://youtu.be/R8J2aChrf7Q
Cultural Relativism http://home.sandiego.edu/~baber/gender/culturalrelativism.html
Modern Slavery https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2017/06/lolas-story/524490/
Roman Catholic Gay Judge Denied Communion Grand Rapids MI https://www.cnn.com/2019/11/30/us/gay-michigan-judge-communion/index.html
Alex Morris Trump and Evangelicals https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-features/christian-right-worships-donald-trump-915381/
Christian Smith Soul Searching https://amzn.to/2M1yelt
Kathy Keller Gender and Justice https://amzn.to/2PPPiMD
Streams of Living Water Richard Foster https://amzn.to/2EnWH0f
Fulton Street Revival https://www.christianitytoday.com/edstetzer/2007/september/fulton-street-revival-anniversary.html

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/WkkHMTt The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.


If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/



For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/



To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 



If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 



All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos. 



To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay


To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62



https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay



Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay



Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/



Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A
